title: Collection
description: 'The Collection' features Five of Jackson's UK Singles, Including the Top Ten Hits 'It's Different for Girls' & 'Steppin Out.' Other Tracks Include 'Nocturne,' 'Is She Really Going Out with Him,' 'Happy Loving Couples,' 'Fools in Love,' 'Friday,' 'Be My Number Two' & 'Another World.'
